heading: HB03555
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING DISCRIMINATION ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY (SOGI) AND PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2017-09-20, transmitted to the Senate on 2017-10-03 and received by the Senate on 2017-10-03 Substituted by HB04982
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03555
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING DISCRIMINATION ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY (SOGI) AND PROVIDING PENALTIES THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLARIN, TOM S.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2016-11-15
          -4th Mother Committee Meeting. Continuation of consideration/Deliberation on the Bills on Anti-Discrimination on the Basis of Sexual Orientation or Gender Identity (SOGI) [HB Nos. 51, 267, 949, 1034, 1108, 1451, 1854, 3245, 3555 & 3701
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-12-05
          -6th Mother Committee Meeting. Third Deliberation on the bills re: Anti-Discrimination on the Basis of Sexual Orientation or Gender Identity or Expression (SOGIE)[House Bill Nos. 51, 267, 949, 1034, 1108, 1451, 1854, 3245, 3555 & 3701]
      3. Approved by the Committee on 2016-12-05
      4. Committee Report filed on 2017-02-07
          -House Committee Report No. 101 in substitution of HB Nos. 51, 267,949,1034,1108,1451,1854,3245,3555,3701 & 4414
      5. Committee Report Approved on 2017-09-13
          -Approved on Second Reading
      6. Committee Report Approved on 2017-09-20
          -Substituted by HB No. 04982. Approved on 3rd Reading. Transmitted to the Senate on 2017-10-03 and received by the Senate on 2017-10-03.
MOTHER BILL: HB04982
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY ON 2016-09-14
